main event: Airman with radar background observed 1 round object with red light, 10-15 feet in size, for 6 seconds. The object appeared to make a turn or change in direction before disappearing.
interesting points: The object was not found on radar, nor could it be identified as any known or probable aircraft.
Other similar sightings were reported in the area around that time.
The object was observed by an Airman with radar background, indicating it was likely an unusual aerial phenomenon.
The object appeared to make a turn or change in direction before disappearing from sight.
The sighting lasted for a relatively short duration of 6 seconds.
sighted object: one round object with red light
location: 5 miles SE of Altus AFB, Oklahoma
